attributes.action: stop asylum seeks,muslims, and any other non british born person that does not cotributre to the country.ie work learn to speap english or goby our rules to be taken back to there own counrty.

attributes.background: I am really ashamed to be called Britsh these days. People that are Born in this Country Do not get any help that they so need un like the much as the asylum seekes, muslim sand other NON British origin.They do not contribute and they need to get out of this county. If they want to stay here then they should go by our rules and regulations. And Do as We Do!
